entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Hudson Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:16 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -29.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hudson Bay 7:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -29.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 104.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -37
Dewpoint: -32.6°C
Wind: SSW 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 33 in the evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022
